description.value: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true-you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage. Choose one of the following cantrips: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Acid Splash]{Acid Splash}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Electric Arc]{Electric Arc}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Produce Flame]{Produce Flame}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Ray of Frost]{Ray of Frost}. You can cast this spell as an innate arcane spell at will, and when you cast it, the spell's energy emerges from your mouth.
